title: MA60083: Multivariate Analysis - Quick Facts

Course name | Multivariate Analysis

Credits | 4

Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Probability and StatisticsMultiple linear regression, problems of multicollinearity, heteroscedasticity and their remedies, autocorrelation and its remedial measures, polynomial regression and the method of orthogonal polynomials, nonlinear regression - some specific models and solutions. Testing general linear hypothesis - testing equality of means of several normal distributions with common covariance matrix, MANOVA, testing independence of a set of variates, testing hypotheses of equality of covariance matrices. Confounding in factorial experiments, fractional replications, split-plot designs. BIBD and PBIBD. Factor analysis.
